data.system_settings: Xperia X Performance, Android 7.1.1. *Exclusive to Android 7 and certain phone models (beyond my own also some Samsung S7/S8 and possibly others)*
data.actual_result: Flashlight won't start, camera says it's used by another application
data.short_description: Camera process stays open in background when it should close, only on certain phones
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the camera in discord in fullscreen mode - Take an image - Leave the image in the message bar - Switch to another app using the button on your phone - Try to use camera or flashlight
